reviews.text:
We traveled to Florence with a baby and looked for a place that will be easy to access with a car. It was perfect, the staff was amazing and the room was clean and worth the money. The view is great and Fiesole is such a sweet place.
Big thank you to Nicolas and the team.

We had a wonderful time at Villa Fiesole. The room was clean and comfortable. We ate at the restaurant twice, first on Saturday night for the gourmet experience, which was superb and memorable (beetroot mousse! the celeriac starter! the pigeon!) and second, on Sunday night, for the less starry “bistro” service, which was also delicious (the lamb stew tortella omg). Both nights Sergei and Nicole tended to our every need with engaging good humour and warmth. Thank you!

It’s our 4th stop in Italy for our Big family trip.
Arriving at night, we got a warm welcome by Francesca. She was very helpful and cheerful during our stay. Solved my problems at night when I was out of shower gel. And she got the sense of humour that help me to ease the pressure with a big family.
The scenery of the hotel was superb. The excellent breakfast was a must too. The best banana croissant we had in italy(probably Europe? Personally) With $1600hkd per night got this level of quality, I would recommend all people to have your breakfast here when you stay. ( same price in Milan we only got quality half of here)

The manager Nicola in restaurant helped for our 3 days stay. The young waiters who I didn’t know the name were helpful too. Best service in our stay in Italy.

The most incredible hotel! We have just returned from a large group booking here we couldn’t be happier with our experience. The hotel staff go above and beyond to make your stay the best possible. The restaurant food was delicious, it’s a must try during your stay. They have a bus stop outside which takes you right into Florence, or Fiesole in the other direction. We can’t wait to return!

Great hotel, room, and staff. No issues with anything but there would be for the handicapped, because quite a bit of stair climbing is needed to get from the street to the hotel. This is a location based limitation though. Besides this, we found no other issues.
